javadoc: An edge shape that renders as a series of straight lines between articulation points.

methods.name: getOverlapOffset
methods.comment:
Returns a value by which to offset edges that overlap.  This is used to make the edges
 easier to see.

methods.javadoc:
Get the shape for this edge, returning either the shared instance or, in
 the case of self-loop edges, the Loop shared instance.
methods.name: apply
methods.comment:
Get the shape for this edge, returning either the shared instance or, in
 the case of self-loop edges, the Loop shared instance.

name: ArticulatedEdgeTransformer
comment: An edge shape that renders as a series of straight lines between articulation points.
